periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Areas Of Fog then Patchy Fog
periods.detailedForecast: Areas of fog and a chance of showers and thunderstorms before midnight, then patchy fog and scattered rain showers. Cloudy. Low around 43, with temperatures rising to around 50 overnight. Southwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: Isolated rain showers before 5pm. Partly sunny. High near 51, with temperatures falling to around 48 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 33. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 46. Northeast wind around 8 mph.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 38. East wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 63. South wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 29. Northwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 42. North wind 6 to 9 mph.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Rain And Snow
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow after midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 31. North northeast wind around 6 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 41. Northeast wind around 8 mph.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Rain and snow likely. Cloudy, with a low around 31. Northeast wind 7 to 10 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 37. North northeast wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 23. North northeast wind around 9 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 35. North wind around 9 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.
